bill.title: Driving under the influence; revise.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 63-11-30 And Section 63-11-31, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Imposition Of An Ignition-interlock Order In A Dui Case; To Repeal Section 63-11-49, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For Impoundment Of A Vehicle Driven By A Person Charged With A Third Or Subsequent Charge Of Driving Under The Influence; To Repeal Section 63-11-51, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For Forfeiture Proceedings For A Vehicle Driven By A Person Charged With A Third Or Subsequent Charge Of Driving Under The Influence; To Repeal Section 63-11-53, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For The Disposition Of A Vehicle Driven By A Person Charged With A Third Or Subsequent Charge Of Driving Under The Influence; And For Related Purposes.
